trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native MSMQ protocol.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來為 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務指定佇列通訊屬性的繫結項目 (該服務會使用原生 MSMQ 通訊協定)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement> enables the user to set the properties of the queued communication channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement> 可讓使用者設定佇列通訊通道的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The queued communication channel uses MSMQ for its transport.
trans-unit.target: 佇列通訊通道的傳輸中會使用 MSMQ。

trans-unit.source: This binding element is the default binding element used by the MSMQ standard binding (<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>).
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結項目是 MSMQ 標準繫結 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>) 所使用的預設繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> to which settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: 要套用設定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the settings of this configuration element to the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> binding element.
trans-unit.target: 將這個組態項目的設定套用至指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> 繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding type.
trans-unit.target: 取得繫結的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the binding type.
trans-unit.target: 表示繫結型別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The element to copy settings from.
trans-unit.target: 複製設定的來源項目。

trans-unit.source: Copies the settings from the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement" /> to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將這些設定從指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement" /> 複製到這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal MSMQ message objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整數，指定包含內部 MSMQ 訊息物件之集區的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal MSMQ message objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含內部 MSMQ 訊息物件之集區大小上限的整數。

trans-unit.source: The internal MSMQ message object pool is used to avoid allocations of these objects when sending and receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 內部 MSMQ 訊息物件集區是用來在收送訊息時避免這些物件的配置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum pool size is a performance tuning parameter.
trans-unit.target: 集區大小的上限是效能調整參數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 8。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定列舉值，這個值表示此繫結所使用的佇列通訊通道傳輸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> enumeration value that indicates the transport used for message delivery between queue managers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> 列舉值，這個值表示在佇列管理員之間用於訊息傳遞的傳輸。

trans-unit.source: MSMQ does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol, so do not set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.QueueTransferProtocol%2A> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.SrmpSecure> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol 時，MSMQ 不支援 Active Directory 定址，因此當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.QueueTransferProtocol%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> 時，請勿將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.SrmpSecure> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> 或 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，這個值會指出是否應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: MSMQ queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names.
trans-unit.target: MSMQ 佇列位址可以由路徑名稱或直接格式名稱組成。

trans-unit.source: With a direct format name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS, or IP.
trans-unit.target: 如為直接格式名稱，MSMQ 會使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: With a path name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 如為路徑名稱，MSMQ 會使用 Active Directory 解析佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: By default, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 佇列的傳輸會將訊息佇列的 URI 轉換成直接格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the computer name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> 屬性設定為 `true`，應用程式可以指定佇列傳輸應使用 Active Directory 來解析電腦名稱，而非使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 來解析。
